articles.description: Astronomers who watched the aftermath of a NASA spacecraft colliding with an asteroid released new images. Taken by the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope in Chile, they reveal detailed views of a debris cloud following the DART mission.

articles.title: Sleeping less than 5 hours a day increases cardiovascular risk by 74%, warns new study - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: ​Sleeping less than 7 to 8 hours a day puts your heart at risk and leads to the development of peripheral artery disease (PAD), a new study published in European Heart Journal – Open has found.​
articles.content:
Peripheral artery disease or PAD is when the arteries of the arms and legs are narrowed down due to deposition of plaques.
